text: Diana Lambert (1931–1995) was a British actress. She was born on 17 September 1931 in Kensington, London, England as Diana Charlotte Herrmann. She was an actress, known for The Nun's Story (1959), Seance on a Wet Afternoon (1964) and Vicky's First Ball (1956). Lambert also appeared in Mrs Thursday, The Famous Five and appeared in the BBC department store sitcom Are You Being Served? three times (1976 and 1985), once playing a customer and the other two playing Captain Peacock's long suffering, battle axe wife. She died in Kensington, London in 1995 aged 63. ==References== ==External links== * Category:20th-century British actresses Category:1931 births Category:1995 deaths Category:People from Kensington
title: Diana Lambert
